title: Blurb
content: Hi, my name is William Murphy, and I'm eager to make a career change into the tech industry. With 5 years of experience in the construction industry, I bring a diverse skill set and a passion for innovation. I've always been fascinated by technology and the endless possibilities it presents, and I believe I have the drive and determination to succeed in this field. My experience as a team lead in the construction industry has given me the ability to solve complex problems, work effectively in teams, and manage multiple projects at once. I'm eager to use these skills to help create cutting-edge technology that will have a positive impact on society. I believe that I can bring a unique perspective to the tech industry and make valuable contributions to any company I join.
